title: What if the majority have got it all wrong?
body:
Contrary to popular belief...

What if surrendering actually DOESN'T help you climb ranked?

What if quitting doesn't help you win the game?

What if the Fiora rework ruined E-sports forever?

What if blind farming jungle and never looking at the mini map and never helping gank lanes actually DOESN'T make you a good jungler?

What if complaining about people who are in your lane sulking by the turret that someone is in your lane ISN'T actually as good as helping them get 1st blood?

What if downvoting all my posts for no good reason without any substantial argument DOESN'T actually make your votes cool?

replies.body:
> What if surrendering actually DOESN'T help you climb ranked?

It helps you climb only in unwinnable games. Because it lets you enter  the next game sooner.
However all games are winnable till you get to the highest of tiers where once the enemy has a big enough lead you're dead. They dont make mistakes. You lose. That is it.

I'm talking people that make it to worlds type of ELO.
No, lol. If you know that you are not good enough to carry and your whole team is feeding, ff would be the right choice.
nonsense, I don't expect myself to play like challenger so I'd rather resign

Listen anybody who quits in ranked...
Doesn't deserve to play in ranked. Go back to bots if you think quitting is helping you climb ranked. That is like catching yourself on fire when you are already hot.

> What if the Fiora rework ruined E-sports forever?

That's a bit of a powerful statement, don't you think?

It did for me...  I essentially got my champion nerfed for being too good at the game. 

I was getting level 1 pentakills.  Only me.  Nobody else was but I never have again since the rework.
It made it so it doesn't matter how good you are at the game anymore. 
You could be better than anybody alive and it doesn't matter... you are still going to loose when you 1vs5 with a dead team defending the nexus.

Riot made it a game of competition and made it into a game of chance more like a slot machine depending on if you ever get a good teamate like yourself.  I don't.  I have 4 quitters every game with a sour attitude. 
There isn't a champ you can win with when your team is bad since Riot destroyed Fiora.

A game of skill and a game of chance or two different things. 

It was a good game.

Take away Fiora's double lunge and there is no way you can win based on skill. 
Take away Fiora's ult and there is no longer a way to defend 1vs5 with 4 dead teamates at the end of the match every game it's the same story. 

5 vs 1 Nerfed Fiora = gg

Skill no longer has a chance to win based on skill.

It's based on luck. 

Luck that you might get a good player on your team and that just doesn't happen.

Level 1 Pentakills. I brand you as a troll and am no longer taking you seriously.

This is not a game of chance. Faker repeatedly gets into challenger not because he's the luckiest player.

You have lost my respect.
i think he is just mad, when your mad you cant think straight

I came expecting stupid, instead i found hilarity.

10/10
